Cambridge.Reginald A. Daly House:
The Reginald A. Daly House is a historic house located at 23 Hawthorn Street, Cambridge, Massachusetts. It is a National Historic Landmark, notable for its association with Reginald Aldworth Daly (1871-1957), an eminent geologist, Penrose Medal winner, and Harvard University professor.
The house is a two-story wood frame structure, estimated to have been built in the 1880s or 1890s.
